Literature.Title: Modulation of structure and antibacterial and hemolytic activity by ring size in cyclic gramicidin S analogs.
Literature.Author: Kondejewski LH, Farmer SW, Wishart DS, Kay CM, Hancock RE, Hodges RS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=17µg/ml),Escherichia coli DC2(MIC=9µg/ml),Escherichia coli SC9251(MIC=11µg/ml),Escherichia coli SC9252(MIC=14µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H187(MIC=38µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H188(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAP 0017(MIC=130µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus K147(MIC=150µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=38µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=100µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=150µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=13µg/ml)
